articles.author: fin24
articles.title: South Africa's land reform rises from 'the ashes of dispossession'
articles.description: The Matsamo Communal Property Association (CPA) now owns more than 14 000 hectares which they manage in cooperation with white farmers in a rare model of successful land reform.
articles.content: The Matsamo Communal Property Association (CPA) now owns more than 14 000 hectares which they manage in cooperation with white farmers in a rare model of successful land reform.

articles.author: CBC News
articles.title: Urban sugaring a success for one Haligonian, but city not so sweet on idea | CBC News
articles.description: A Halifax man produced two litres of syrup from a maple on his property and another on the city's property. But the city says it can damage trees.
articles.content:

articles.author: Victoria Pengilley
articles.title: Boy aged nine killed in accidental shooting near Goulburn
articles.description: Officers were told the nine-year-old had been injured after the accidental discharge of a firearm on a rural property in southern NSW.
articles.content:
A nine-year-old boy has been accidentally shot on a rural property near Goulburn in southern New South Wales.

articles.title: ‘It’s a dog eat dog world’ as housing cool-down helps ignite rental market wars

articles.content:
